title: Soraya freeware ?
content:
Soraya freeware font ? I thought it existed and want to comp with it temporarily. Anyone know of who might be offering it. It might be named something closer to Cirkulus. If I get approved on the project I will be buying Soraya - Yahoo! Not that its the crem of the faces I would wish for by any means, but its always great to acquire more faces.

Thanks for any help.
author: bpoliva

comments.content:
Hmm. For something like this, I think you could manage pencil sketches for the comps.

[Circulus](http://web.archive.org/web/20150123062310/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/cirkulus/cirkulus/) and [Soraya](http://web.archive.org/web/20150123062310/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itfprimegraphics/soraya/regular/) are both commercial faces. o, 4, and 7 seem to be the only differences, though, so I wonder if all is kosher.
